findings.title: Style guide violation
findings.description: Unused fields and non-constant fields in the contract.

findings.title: The "minted" field must be constant
findings.description: The 'minted' field is not declared as a constant variable.

findings.title: "name" and "symbol" fields should be constant
findings.description: The contract's "name" and "symbol" fields are not defined as constants.

findings.title: The "minted" field unused.
findings.description: The "minted" field is declared but not utilized within the contract.

findings.title: "name" and "symbol" fields should be constant
findings.description: The contract's "name" and "symbol" fields are not declared as constants.
